name: Genre Mixer
description: Combine genres for unique story concepts
author: raymAIzing film

inputs.label: Unique Element
inputs.placeholder: Time loop, unreliable narrator, found footage...

steps.prompt:
Create genre-blending story concepts:

Primary Genre: {{genre1}}
Secondary Genre: {{genre2}}
Era: {{era}}
Unique Element: {{uniqueElement}}

Generate 3 innovative concepts that blend these genres in unexpected ways:

## CONCEPT 1
- **Title**: [Catchy title]
- **High Concept Pitch**: One sentence that sells it
- **Logline**: 2-3 sentence summary
- **Full Synopsis**: 200 words
- **Why This Combination Works**: Genre synergy explanation
- **Target Audience**: Who would love this
- **Comparable Films/Shows**: Similar successful projects
- **Unique Selling Point**: What makes it stand out
- **Viral Potential**: Score 1-10

[Repeat for concepts 2-3]

## RECOMMENDATION
Which concept is most commercially viable and why.
